content: आश्वस् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To breathe; सुखमाश्वसंति गिरयः <ls>Mv. 5. 51</ls> are lying at ease. {@--2@} To breathe freely, recover breath, take courage, take heart, rest secure, be at ease; प्रत्ययादाश्वसत्यः <ls>Me. 8</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 307</ls>; <ls>Bk. 4. 38</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">5. 23.</ls> {@--3@} To revive. {@--4@} To have confidence in. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To encourage, comfort, console, cheer up; तदा संकीर्तनेनाश्वासयाम्यात्मानं <ls>V. 3</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 5.</ls> <ls n="R.">14. 58.</ls> <ls n="R.">15. 45;</ls> <ls>Me. 113</ls>; <ls>V. 5. 16.</ls> {@--2@} To refresh, gratify; छायाश्वासितपथिकजनसार्थः <ls>Pt. 2.</ls> {@--3@} To conciliate.
